tool_description:
Easily track when a key contact, champion or product power user leaves a company.

Job changes create new opportunities for sales teams. These changes can also create a churn risk in your existing customer base and sales pipeline.

With this API you can track when these changes happen.

Simply provide the LinkedIn Person and Company Profile URLs of the person you want to verify employment. 

- Save hours of manually checking for changes in employment by automating it. 
- Increase sales pipeli...
name: Employment Job Change Tracker
title: Employment Job Change Tracker
